goal.en: Understanding fundamental principles and laws of physics Getting familiar with theoretical derivations and numerical calculations Gaining abilities for studying advanced physics
goal.ch: 了解物理的基本原理和定律 熟悉理論推導與應用計算 培養學習進階物理的能力

content.en:
Code cards will be issued on the first day of class (2/19). For those who want to add this course, please be present. If too many students want to add, then it will be determined by a draw lots. With the code card, please register the course immediately.
Electric Forces
Electric Fields
Gauss‘s Law
Electric Potential
Capacitor and Batteries
Current and Resistance
Direct Current Circuits
Magnetic Fields and Forces
Gauss‘s Law for Magnetism and Ampere‘s Law
Faraday‘s Law of Induction
Inductors and Alternating Current Circuits
Maxwell‘s Equations and Electromagnetic Waves
Diffraction and Interference
Application of the Wave Model
The Origin of Quantum Physics
content.ch:
密碼卡將在第一天上課（2/19）時發放。如有需要加選的同學請出席。如果加選人數過多，將抽籤決定。拿到密碼卡後請馬上註冊。
電力
電場
高斯定律
電位
電容和電池

電感和交流電路
馬克士威方程和電磁波
衍射和干涉
波模型的應用
量子物理的起源
